Method Detail

find

Synapse find(int id,
             java.lang.String network)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
find the node in charge of the id

Parameters:
id - the id to find
network - the network currently used to search
Returns:
the node in charge of the id
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

find

void find(java.lang.String requestID,
          java.lang.String mess,
          java.lang.String key,
          java.lang.Object o,
          Sender sender,
          int nbHop,
          int TTL,
          int MRR)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Send a message with the synapse protocol

Parameters:
requestID - the Id of the request
mess - The message of the request (Get or Put)
key - The key to find if the message is Get. Or the Key associated to the Object to put in the DHT if the message is Put
o - the Object to put in the DHT
sender - the sender of this request
nbHop - the number of hop between networks
TTL - the TTL decreased on each node
MRR - the Maximum Replication Rate
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

n - the node to join
network - the network to join
Returns:
true if the joining is successfully finished, false otherwise
